item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "to fight for each minute is to fight for what is possible within yourself, so that your life and your death will not be like theirs." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "Some people never go crazy. What truly horrible lives they must lead." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "For those who believe in God, most of the big questions are answered. But for those of us who can't readily accept the God formula, the big answers don't remain stone-written. We adjust to new conditions and discoveries. We are pliable. Love need not be a command nor faith a dictum. I am my own god. We are here to unlearn the teachings of the church, state, and our educational system. We are here to drink beer. We are here to kill war. We are here to laugh at the odds and live our lives so well that Death will tremble to take us." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "My ambition is handicapped by laziness" -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "If you're going to try, go all the way. Otherwise, don't even start. This could mean losing girlfriends, wives, relatives and maybe even your mind. It could mean not eating for three or four days. It could mean freezing on a park bench. It could mean jail. It could mean derision. It could mean mockery--isolation. Isolation is the gift. All the others are a test of your endurance, of how much you really want to do it. And, you'll do it, despite rejection and the worst odds. And it will be better than anything else you can imagine. If you're going to try, go all the way. There is no other feeling like that. You will be alone with the gods, and the nights will flame with fire. You will ride life straight to perfect laughter. It's the only good fight there is." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "We're all going to die, all of us, what a circus! That alone should make us love each other but it doesn't. We are terrorized and flattened by trivialities, we are eaten up by nothing." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "Sometimes you climb out of bed in the morning and you think, I'm not going to make it, but you laugh inside â€” remembering all the times you've felt that way." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "there are worse things than being alone but it often takes decades to realize this and most often when you do it's too late and there's nothing worse than too late" -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "Real loneliness is not necessarily limited to when you are alone." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "An intellectual says a simple thing in a hard way. An artist says a hard thing in a simple way." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by charles bukowski
item.description: "If you're losing your soul and you know it, then you've still got a soul left to lose" -- charles bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "Sex is kicking death in the ass while singing." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "Drinking is an emotional thing. It joggles you out of the standardism of everyday life, out of everything being the same. It yanks you out of your body and your mind and throws you against the wall. I have the feeling that drinking is a form of suicide where you're allowed to return to life and begin all over the next day. It's like killing yourself, and then you're reborn. I guess I've lived about ten or fifteen thousand lives now." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "you boys can keep your virgins give me hot old women in high heels with asses that forgot to get old." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "A love like that was a serious illness, an illness from which you never entirely recover." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "my beerdrunk soul is sadder than all the dead christmas trees of the world." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "the free soul is rare, but you know it when you see it - basically because you feel good, very good, when you are near or with them." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "People with no morals often considered themselves more free, but mostly they lacked the ability to feel or love." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "I remember awakening one morning and finding everything smeared with the color of forgotten love." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "I felt like crying but nothing came out. it was just a sort of sad sickness, sick sad, when you can't feel any worse. I think you know it. I think everybody knows it now and then. but I think I have known it pretty often, too often." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "Poetry is what happens when nothing else can." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "We are like roses that have never bothered to bloom when we should have bloomed and it is as if the sun has become disgusted with waiting" -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "Life's as kind as you let it be." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "What a weary time those years were -- to have the desire and the need to live but not the ability." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "...in that drunken place you would like to hand your heart to her and say touch it but then give it back." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "I went to the worst of bars hoping to get killed but all I could do was to get drunk again." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "being alone never felt right. sometimes it felt good, but it never felt right." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "I stopped looking for a Dream Girl, I just wanted one that wasn't a nightmare." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "Love is all right for those who can handle the psychic overload. It's like trying to carry a full garbage can on your back over a rushing river of piss." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Erini add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "Anything is a waste of time unless you are fucking well or creating well or getting well or looming toward a kind of phantom-love-happiness." -- Charles Bukowski
